Name: Welcome To The Backrooms
About the game: Welcome To The Backrooms Don't lose yourself in the endless labyrinth of hallways, elevators, and entities as you traverse through the backrooms collecting essential resources along the way. Craft an endless supply of fully customizable weapons all the way down to the type of materials you use for the handles, blades, etc. Explore all sorts of weird areas and liminal spaces with outcomes completely determined by your wits and knowledge of the backrooms... Features: In depth player health system including: Sanity, Thirst, Stamina, Heartrate, Enhanced Blood System, and Body Temperature. Infinite, procedurally generated levels with fully random entity encounters. Sandbox open world. Crude crafting system and Building system to allow you to protect yourself from the horrors of the Backrooms. Random lore to uncover in your journey through the backrooms.
